articles.title: Natural Resources on Mars Could Produce Rocket Fuel, Say Researchers - IGN SOUTH EAST ASIA
articles.description: Cyanobacteria and E. coli could be the key to Martian rocket fuel.
articles.content:
A new study has discovered that future astronauts who find themselves on Mars may be able to use its natural resources to help make rocket fuel that could assist in getting them back to Earth.

articles.title: Pope Francis agrees to make 1st papal visit to India since 1999 - Rappler
articles.description: The last pope to visit India was John Paul II, who went to New Delhi in 1999 to issue a papal document on the Church in Asia
articles.content: In 2016, Francis said he was "almost sure" of visiting India the following year along with Bangladesh. But Indian Catholic Church leaders failed to convince Modi, who heads a nationalist administrati… [+17 chars]

articles.title: Schools issue warnings over children copying Netflix's Squid Game - AsiaOne
articles.description: Schools around the world are worried that children may watch Netflix smash hit Squid Game and mimic scenes from the popular but violent Korean drama series.
